 17 /**
 18  * @class WebGL renderer.
 19  */
 20 bigshot.WebGLVRRenderer = function (container) {
 21     this.container = container;
 22     
 23     this.canvas = document.createElement ("canvas");
 24     this.canvas.width = 480;
 25     this.canvas.height = 480;
 26     this.canvas.style.position = "absolute";
 27     this.container.appendChild (this.canvas);
 28     
 29     this.webGl = new bigshot.WebGL (this.canvas);
 30     this.webGl.initShaders ();
 31     this.webGl.gl.clearColor(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);
 32     this.webGl.gl.blendFunc (this.webGl.gl.ONE, this.webGl.gl.ZERO);
 33     this.webGl.gl.enable (this.webGl.gl.BLEND);
 34     this.webGl.gl.disable (this.webGl.gl.DEPTH_TEST);
 35     this.webGl.gl.clearDepth (1.0);
 36     
 37     var that = this;
 38     this.buffers = new bigshot.TimedWeakReference (function () {
 39             return that.setupBuffers ();
 40         }, function (heldObject) {
 41             that.disposeBuffers (heldObject);
 42         }, 1000);
 43 }
 44 
 45 bigshot.WebGLVRRenderer.prototype = {
 46     createTileCache : function (onloaded, onCacheInit, parameters) {
 47         return new bigshot.TextureTileCache (onloaded, onCacheInit, parameters, this.webGl);
 48     },
 49     
 50     createTexturedQuadScene : function () {
 51         return new bigshot.WebGLTexturedQuadScene (this.webGl, this.buffers);
 52     },
 53     
 54     setupBuffers : function () {
 55         var vertexPositionBuffer = this.webGl.gl.createBuffer();
 56         
 57         var textureCoordBuffer = this.webGl.gl.createBuffer();
 58         this.webGl.gl.bindBuffer(this.webGl.gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, textureCoordBuffer);
 59         var textureCoords = [
 60             // Front face
 61             0.0,  0.0,
 62             1.0,  0.0,
 63             1.0,  1.0,
 64             0.0,  1.0
 65         ];
 66         this.webGl.gl.bufferData (this.webGl.gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, new Float32Array (textureCoords), this.webGl.gl.STATIC_DRAW);
 67         
 68         var vertexIndexBuffer = this.webGl.gl.createBuffer();
 69         this.webGl.gl.bindBuffer(this.webGl.gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, vertexIndexBuffer);            
 70         var vertexIndexes = [
 71             0, 2, 1,
 72             0, 3, 2
 73         ];
 74         this.webGl.gl.bufferData(this.webGl.gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, new Uint16Array (vertexIndexes), this.webGl.gl.STATIC_DRAW);
 75         
 76         this.webGl.gl.bindBuffer(this.webGl.gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, textureCoordBuffer);
 77         this.webGl.gl.vertexAttribPointer(this.webGl.shaderProgram.textureCoordAttribute, 2, this.webGl.gl.FLOAT, false, 0, 0);
 78         
 79         this.webGl.gl.bindBuffer(this.webGl.gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, vertexPositionBuffer);
 80         this.webGl.gl.vertexAttribPointer(this.webGl.shaderProgram.vertexPositionAttribute, 3, this.webGl.gl.FLOAT, false, 0, 0);
 81         
 82         return {
 83             vertexPositionBuffer : vertexPositionBuffer,
 84             textureCoordBuffer : textureCoordBuffer,
 85             vertexIndexBuffer : vertexIndexBuffer
 86         };
 87     },
 88     
 89     dispose : function () {
 90         this.buffers.dispose ();
 91         this.container.removeChild (this.canvas);
 92         delete this.canvas;
 93         this.webGl.dispose ();
 94         delete this.webGl;
 95     },
 96     
 97     disposeBuffers : function (buffers) {
 98         this.webGl.gl.deleteBuffer (buffers.vertexPositionBuffer);
 99         this.webGl.gl.deleteBuffer (buffers.vertexIndexBuffer);
100         this.webGl.gl.deleteBuffer (buffers.textureCoordBuffer);
101     },
102     
103     getElement : function () {
104         return this.canvas;
105     },
106     
107     supportsUpdate : function () {
108         return false;
109     },
110     
111     createTexturedQuad : function (p, u, v, texture) {
112         return new bigshot.WebGLTexturedQuad (p, u, v, texture);
113     },
114     
115     getViewportWidth : function () {
116         return this.webGl.gl.viewportWidth;
117     },
118     
119     getViewportHeight : function () {
120         return this.webGl.gl.viewportHeight;
121     },
122     
123     beginRender : function (rotation, fov, translation, rotationOffsets) {
124         this.webGl.gl.viewport (0, 0, this.webGl.gl.viewportWidth, this.webGl.gl.viewportHeight);
125         
126         this.webGl.pMatrix.reset ();
127         this.webGl.pMatrix.perspective (fov, this.webGl.gl.viewportWidth / this.webGl.gl.viewportHeight, 0.1, 100.0);
128         
129         this.webGl.mvMatrix.reset ();
130         this.webGl.mvMatrix.translate (translation);
131         this.webGl.mvMatrix.rotateZ (rotationOffsets.r);
132         this.webGl.mvMatrix.rotateX (rotationOffsets.p);
133         this.webGl.mvMatrix.rotateY (rotationOffsets.y);
134         this.webGl.mvMatrix.rotateY (rotation.y);
135         this.webGl.mvMatrix.rotateX (rotation.p);
136         
137         this.mvMatrix = this.webGl.mvMatrix;
138         this.pMatrix = this.webGl.pMatrix;
139         this.mvpMatrix = this.pMatrix.matrix ().multiply (this.mvMatrix.matrix ());
140     },
141     
142     endRender : function () {
143         
144     },
145     
146     resize : function (w, h) {
147         this.canvas.width = w;
148         this.canvas.height = h;
149         if (this.container.style.width != "") {
150             this.container.style.width = w + "px";
151         }
152         if (this.container.style.height != "") {
153             this.container.style.height = h + "px";
154         }
155     },
156     
157     onresize : function () {
158         this.webGl.onresize ();
159     }
160 }
161 
162 bigshot.Object.extend (bigshot.WebGLVRRenderer, bigshot.AbstractVRRenderer);
163 bigshot.Object.validate ("bigshot.WebGLVRRenderer", bigshot.VRRenderer);
164
